episodes.title: S2-E8 INTO THE LIGHT: Ex-Follower Amanda Briggs Talks About Growing Up in the the IBLP Cult Made Famous by the Duggar Family Reality Show
episodes.description: Welcome podcast lovers to another compelling episode of One Good Thing Media — your beacon of insightful conversations and uplifting reviews. Today's episode, "Into the Light," is especially riveting with a spicy blend of truth and  no topic being  taboo during an in-depth interview with Amanda and Kyle Briggs, co-hosts of "The Cult I Left Behind” podcast that’s currently reverberating across the podverse. During this interview, Amanda tells her remarkable journey from growing up under the control of the Institute of Basic Life Principles (IBLP) where education was skewed, personal autonomy was a foreign concept, and women bore an undue burden of responsibility for men's actions. Yet, it’s through this lens of past oppression that Amanda's true story shines through as one of courage and self-discovery. So dear listeners, let’s all  pour a cup of our favorite brew, kick back, and prepare to be mesmerized by what it was really  like growing up in the IBLP.  Listener caution is advised!CONTACTS for Amanda and KylePodcast:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-cult-i-left-behind/id1705661944Website:https://www.cultileftbehind.com/Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/people/The-Cult-I-Left-Behind/61551657642775/Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/cultileftbehind/www.onegoodthingmedia.comwww.facebook.com/onegoodthingmedia
